doc.field: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
Benjamin Wood Home 1826 Woodville--Samuel G White Home 1872--Dr Harry Lewis Baptist (1874-1966) Home 1920--The earliest that this house could be documented in court and tax records is 1829

2 Story Frame, Hall-Parlor + 2 Story Brick, 1 over 1, Telescopic Form, Double Row Mousetooth Cornice, Flemish Bond, 3 Course American Bond, 4 Course American Bond, Stone Chimney, Stuccoed to Resemble Stone, Mortise and Tenon Joinery, Pegged Joinery, Pitsaw Marks, Reciprocating Saw Marks, Circular Saw Marks, Rectangular Banisters, Winter Kitchen, Beaded Siding, Cut Nails with Stamped Heads, Symmetrical Trim, Rondel Blocks, 4 Panel Doors, 6 Panel Doors, 6/6, 2/2, 9/6, Blinds, Barred Cellar Windows, Frame Doctor's Office (The Cottage), Barn Ruins
